    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame(int numberOfPlayers,
                      java.lang.String strategies)
        Initializes the Game Manager with number of players
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - tells numbers of players going to play the game
        strategies - is the comma separated string example b,r,c Have to catch the InvalidNumOfPlayersException exception

      • resumeGame

        Returns:

      • setGameManager

        public void setGameManager(GameManager gameManager)

      • getUIState

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getUIState()
        Returns:
